def_en: A Band-Aid is a small piece of sticky tape that you use to cover small cuts or wounds on your body.

def_cn: （问题的解决办法）短期有效的，权宜之计的，治标不治本的
def_en: If you refer to a Band-Aid solution to a problem, you mean that you disapprove of it because you think that it will only be effective for a short period.
A Band-Aid is a small piece of sticky tape that you use to cover small cuts or wounds on your body.
